Verses: 1 nee Un Saththurukkalukku Edhiraaga Yuththanjeyyap Purappattup Pogaiyil, Kudhiraigalaiyum Radhangalaiyum, Unnilum Periya Koottamaagiya Janangalaiyum Kandaal, Avargalukkup Bayappagaayaaga; Unnai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnode Irukkiraar.
2 neengal Yuththanjeyyath Thodangumbodhu, Aasaariyan Serndhuvandhu, Janangalidaththil Pesi:
3 isravelare, Kelungal: Indru Ungal Saththurukkaludan Yuththanjeyyap Pogireergal; Ungal Irudhayam Thuvalavendaam; Neengal Avargalaip Paarththup Bayappadavum Kalangavum Thaththalikkavum Vendaam.
4 ungalukkaaga Ungal Saththurukkalode Yuththampannavum Ungalai Ratchikkavum Ungalode Koodappogiravar Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarendru Sollavendum.

5 andriyum Adhibadhigal Janangalai Nokki: Pudhuveettaik Katti, Adhaip Piradhishtaipannaadhirukkiravan Evano, Avan Than Veettukkuth Thirumbippogakkadavan; Avan Yuththaththile Seththaal Veroruvan Adhaip Piradhishtaipannavendiyadhaagum.
6 thiraatchaththottaththai Naatti, Adhai Anubaviyaadhirukkiravan Evano, Avan Than Veettukkuth Thirumbippogakkadavan; Avan Yuththaththile Seththaal Veroruvan Adhai Anubavikkavendiyadhaagum.

7 oru Pennaith Thanakku Niyamiththukkondu, Avalai Vivaagampannaadhirukkiravan Evano, Avan Than Veettukkuththirumpippogakkadavan; Avan Yuththaththile Seththaal Veroruvan Avalai Vivaagampannavendiyadhaagum Endru Sollavendum.

8 pinnum Adhibadhigal Janangaludane Pesi: Bayangaaliyum Dhidanatravanumaayirukkiravan Evano, Avan Than Sagodhararin Irudhayaththaith Than Irudhayaththaippolak Karaindhupogappannaadhabadikku, Than Veettukkuth Thirumbippogakkadavan Endru Sollavendum.
9 adhibadhigal Janangalode Pesimudindhapinbu, Janangalai Nadaththumbadi Senaiththalaivarai Niyamikkakkadavargal.
10 nee Oru Pattanaththinmel Yuththampanna Nerungumbodhu, Andhap Pattanaththaarukkuch Samaadhaanam Koorakkadavaai.
11 avargal Unakkuch Samaadhaanamaana Uththaravukoduththu, Vaasalaith Thirandhaal, Adhilulla Janangal Ellaarum Unakkup Pagudhi Kattugiravargalaagi, Unakku Oozhiyanjeyyakkadavargal.
12 avargal Unnode Samaadhaanappadaamal, Unnode Yuththampannuvaargalaanaal, Nee Adhai Mutrikkaipottu,
13 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Adhai Un Kaiyil Oppukkodukkumbodhu, Adhilulla Purushargal Ellaaraiyum Pattayakkarukkinaal Vetti,

14 sdhireegalaiyum Kuzhandhaigalaiyum Mirugajeevangalaiyum Maaththiram Uyirode Vaiththu, Pattanaththilulla Ellaavatraiyum Kollaiyittu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakku Oppukkoduththa Un Saththurukkalin Kollaipporulai Anubavippaayaaga.
15 indha Jaadhigalaich Serndha Pattanangalaayiraamal, Unakku Vegudhooraththilirukkira Sagala Pattanangalukkum Ippadiye Seyvaayaaga.

16 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkira Eththiyar, Emoriyar, Kaanaaniyar, Perisiyar, Eviyar, Eboosiyar Ennum Janangalin Pattanangalilemaaththiram Suvaasamulladhondraiyum Uyirode Vaikkaamal,
17 avargalai Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye Sangaarampannakkadavaai.

18 avargal Thangal Dhevargalukkuch Seygira Thangaludaiya Sagala Aruvaruppugalinbadiye Neengalum Seyya Ungalukkuk Katrukkodaamalum, Neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaaip Paavanjeyyaamalum Irukkumbadi Ippadich Seyyavendum.

19 nee Oru Pattanaththinmel Yuththampanni Adhaip Pidikka Anega Naal Adhai Mutrikkaipottirukkumbodhu, Nee Kodariyai Ongi, Adhin Marangalaivettich Sedhampannaayaaga; Avaigalin Kaniyai Nee Pusikkalaame; Aagaiyaal Unakkuk Koththalaththirku Udhavumendru Avaigalai Vettaayaaga; Veliyin Virutchangal Manushanudaiya Jeevanaththukkaanavaigal.
20 pusikkiradharketra Kani Kodaadha Maram Endru Nee Arindhirukkira Marangalaimaaththiram Vettiyazhiththu, Unnode Yuththampannugira Pattanam Pidipadumattum Adharku Edhiraagak Koththalampodalaam.
